description.p: Keep your Markdown managed. Write epic tales, keep a journal, or finally write that book report.
ThiefMD is a Markdown Editor providing an easy way to organize your markdown documents.

description.p: Share your writing, maybe publish that novel?

ul.li: This release fixes some bugs introduced in 0.0.8
Pandoc powered export. ePub, docx, pdf, it's now available
More export formatting options in the Preferences window
More keyboard short-cuts. Ctrl+B, Ctrl+I, you know what they do, and now they do them.
Undo/Redo history is now tied to the file. No more confusion.
Less bugs. Fixed an issue with duplicate listing in the Library.

description.p: Organize your writing and maybe share that great novel you've been working on.

ul.li: Files can now be reordered.
Items in the Library can now be Reordered.

description.p: Dark Mode, Light Mode, and anywhere in between. ThiefMD can now import your favorite themes.

ul.li: Ulysses Theme support.
Fixed bug with black bar with in Editor View mode (Ctrl + 1).
About Window rendering improvements.
Preferences Window rendering improvements.
Preferences Window support for dropping in new themes.
New Preferences keyboard shortcut Ctrl + ,

description.p: Last release broke some preview items.

ul.li: Fix bug in removing characters between parentheses.
Add KaTeX support (if built with libmarkdown 2.2.0 or greater).
